name: punchcards
description: Punchcard visualization using TypeScript and D3.js

scripts.pretest: npm run tsc && npm run dist && echo 'TODO compile the test ts files'
scripts.precover: trash sites/coverage/ && npm run tsc && npm run dist
scripts.cover: npm run test --coverage && npm run remap-istanbul-json && npm run remap-istanbul-html
scripts.clean: npm run clean-build & npm run clean-dist & npm run clean-cover & npm run clean-sites
scripts.clean-sites: npm run clean-demo & npm run clean-tsdoc
scripts.purge: npm run clean & npm run clean-downloaded
scripts.copy-sites-demo-deps: npm run copy-sites-demo-js && npm run copy-sites-demo-css && npm run copy-sites-demo-fonts
scripts.predemo: npm run clean-demo && mkdirp sites/demo/js sites/demo/css sites/demo/fonts/ && npm run copy-sites-demo-deps
scripts.demo: npm run tsc && npm run dist && npm run test
scripts.everything: npm run demo && npm run tsdoc && npm run cover

author: Johan Hidding, Mateusz Kuzak, Jurriaan H. Spaaks, Lourens Veen, Faruk Diblen
